sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使分散，使散开"之意。
means: scatter ： 普通用词，指用暴力等手段使人或物向四处散开，或把物随意撒开。
disperse ： 多指把一群人或物等彻底驱散。
spread ： 指一直延伸、蔓延，侧重遍及。
diffuse ： 指光线、声音或气味等在空中传送或散布，强调覆盖面积与物质分布相对密度之间的关系。

word_mean: 散射：伦琴射线通过介质产生的漫射或偏折。另见backscatter

sentence.Network_en: Scatter the tomato over, then dress the salad.
sentence.Network_cn: 把西红柿散放在上面，然后给色拉加调味汁。

sentence.Network_en: Scatter the grass seed over the lawn.
When the tree falls, the monkeys scatter.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a verb): probably a variant of shatter

entry.def: If you scatter things over an area, you throw or drop them so that they spread all over the area.

example.ex: She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals over the grave...
example.tran: 她掰开玫瑰花，将花瓣撒在坟墓上。
他们总是把玩具扔得到处都是。

entry.tran: (使)(人群)分散;(使)散布在各处;(使)散开
entry.def: If a group of people scatter or if you scatter them, they suddenly separate and move in different directions.

example.ex: The cavalry scattered them and chased them off the field.
example.tran: 骑兵驱散了他们并把他们逐出了战场。

entry.def: A scatter of things is a number of them spread over an area in an irregular way.

example.ex: On the table was a pile of books and a scatter of papers.
example.tran: 桌子上放着一摞书和零落的几份报纸。

means.word_mean: 1. a haphazard distribution in all directions
1. to cause to separate and go in different directions;

sentences.sentence: "She waved her hand and scattered the crowds"
"The children scattered in all directions when the teacher approached";
"He scattered gun powder under the wagon"

means.word_mean: 6. strew or distribute over an area;

auth_sentence.content: Scatter half of the fried onions over the top.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scatter half of the fried onions over the top.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scatter half of the fried onions over the top.

auth_sentence.content: Mix well, scatter over your salad and serve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mix well, scatter over your salad and serve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mix well, scatter over your salad and serve.

auth_sentence.content: Scatter liberally with sugar and a dusting of cinnamon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scatter liberally with sugar and a dusting of cinnamon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scatter liberally with sugar and a dusting of cinnamon.

sentences.en: The birds scattered at the sound of the gun.
sentences.cn: 枪声一响, 群鸟受惊飞散。

sentences.en: The wind soon scattered the clouds.
The farmers were scattering seeds on the fields.

jushi.english: Then, slowly, the angry crowd scattered.
jushi.chinese: 后来愤怒的人群才逐渐散去。

jushi.english: The following morning, the snow stopped and the clouds scattered.
jushi.chinese: 第二天清晨,雪不下了,云散了。

jushi.english: The birds scattered at the sound of the gun.
